original_title: Chip On My Shoulder: The Cautionary Tale of Slapshot
overview: An unflinching look into the life of a band that was seemingly destined to implode from its very inception. This is a story of friendship and betrayal, loss and redemption, self-destruction and sacrifice. Born in the streets and underground music halls of Boston, Slapshot went on to inspire millions worldwide while simultaneously tearing a group of friends apart.
title: Chip On My Shoulder: The Cautionary Tale of Slapshot
